title: F1 2018: Headline Edition – v1.16 + DLC
body:
F1 2018: Headline Edition – v1.16 + DLC


Genres/Tags: Racing, Simulation, 3D, Open-wheel cars
Company: Codemasters
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI10
Original Size: 32.6 GB
Repack Size: from 15.2 GB [Selective Download]

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet] ENG VO Only
  • Tapochek.net ENG VO Only
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehosters: Google Drive + Uptobox (Uploaded by Uria Urikra, compatible with torrent)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on F1.2018-CODEX ISO release: codex-f1.2018.iso (32,107,560,960 bytes)
  • Update v1.16 (2.7 GB) applied over, thanks to Reina!
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • Headline Content DLC Pack included and activated; game version is v1.16
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of tutorials, credits video/attract video and language packs you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 32.6 to 15.2~18.4 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes: ~13 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~25 minutes on 4-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 41 GB
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • ATTENTION! If you’re installing this repack under Windows 10, run setup with compatibility set to Windows 7

Game Description

F1® 2018 is the official videogame of the 2018 FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP™. Become immersed in the world of Formula 1® more than ever before.

Build your reputation both on and off the track, with time-pressured media interviews that influence your F1 career path. Do you exhibit sportsmanship or showmanship? Will you develop your team to the top or send your agent to target a rival team and driver? F1 2018 puts you in control of your destiny.

  • More classic F1 cars than ever before
  • The most accurate F1 car simulation model yet
  • Stunning graphics and new circuits for 2018: Paul Ricard and Hockenheim

You can skip downloading of credits video and language files you don’t need. Here is the list of selective/optional files:

  • fg-optional-credits.bin (Staff Roll Video + short Attract Video)
  • fg-optional-tutorials.bin (Different tutorial videos, download if you’re new to series)
  • fg-selective-english.bin (REQUIRED for English, Russian, Polish & Simplified Chinese users)
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-italian.bin
  • fg-selective-japanese.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with German UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective” files, but download fg-selective-german.bin & all main files (01-10).

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS HEAVILY backwards compatible with my previous F1 2018 repack. Only the following files has been changed, allowing you to save up to 17.3 GB of traffic.

  • fg-05.bin
  • fg-09.bin
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin
  • fg-selective-english.bin

fg-10.bin and fg-selective-japanese.bin has been added. setup.exe, obviously, was updated.
